name: JANA KALYAN SAMITEE
briefDescription: Janakalyana Samitee  is registered not for profit, voluntary development organization established in 2004 and registered in 19TH August  of 2004, under the Societies Registration Act of 1860. JKS had been involved into multifaceted activities for the empowerment and holistic development of the disadvantaged population of Odisha. Various Social interventions including awareness on education, Sanitation, child Rights, health, women empowerment, livelihoods restoration & management, sustainable agriculture and allied activities, skill and capacity building, local area art Craft & Culture development. Our Mission is Establishment of an equitable social order through motivation,facilitation and self activity among backward peoples.
